queries_list.sensor: WITH RECURSIVE "LocationList" AS (SELECT "Location".* FROM "Location" where "Location"."LocationId" in (SELECT "Location"."LocationId" FROM "Location" JOIN "MemberLocation" ON "MemberLocation"."LocationId" = "Location"."LocationId" AND "MemberId" in (SELECT "MemberId" from "Member" where "UserName" in ('{}')) ) UNION ALL SELECT d.* FROM "Location" AS d JOIN "LocationList" AS sd ON (d."ParentLocationId" = sd."LocationId")) SELECT "Sensor".* FROM "Sensor" Join "LocationList" on "Sensor"."MappedLocationId" = "LocationList"."LocationId" ORDER BY "SensorId"
